properties.description:
Audio Album MODS Form

If you think you may have selected the wrong form (e.g. if you can't find a field that you think should be available), retrace your steps and pick another form.
Required. Title of the audio album.
properties.title: Audio Album Title

properties.description: Subtitle of the audio album.
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description:
A URI to a title entity that uniquely represents this title; e.g., the URI to the CWRC MODS record for this title, or the URI to the title's "Works" or "Expressions" record in VIAF (Virtual International Authority File).
• CWRC entity URI formulation: http://commons.cwrc.ca/PID
For example, http://commons.cwrc.ca/islandora:6167a5c9-80a3-4c85-8acb-f5ee93b65e21
The PID can be found after "/islandora/object/" in the URL string to the entity -- change "%3A" after the namespace in the PID to ":". E.g., from this http://beta.cwrc.ca/islandora/object/islandora%3A6167a5c9-80a3-4c85-8acb-f5ee93b65e21 derive this http://commons.cwrc.ca/islandora:6167a5c9-80a3-4c85-8acb-f5ee93b65e21
• VIAF entity URI formulation: http://viaf.org/viaf/PID
For example, http://viaf.org/viaf/48146462553927771156
properties.title: URI

properties.description: Alternative title of the audio album.
properties.title: Alternative Title

properties.description: To enter more names associated with the resource, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each name panel.
properties.title: Name

properties.description: Personal name or corporate name; personal: indicates the name is that of a person; corporate: indicates that the name is that of a company, institution, or other organization. If a corporate name, provide the corporate name using the "Corporate Name" field below.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Person's full name. Inverted order is preferred rather than direct order, so last name or family name first, followed by a comma, followed by first or given names. If desired, the person's name can instead be parsed into family name and given names using the fields below.
properties.title: Full Name

properties.description:
A URI to a person entity that uniquely represents this person; e.g. the URI to the CWRC person entity for this name, or the URI to the person's "Personal Names" record in VIAF (Virtual International Authority File). If a corporate name, then use the URI for the CWRC organization entity or VIAF "Corporate Names" record.
• CWRC entity URI formulation: http://commons.cwrc.ca/PID
For example, http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:b774f9b9-9b77-4601-b4b7-1b19947f7800
The PID can be found after "/islandora/object/" in the URL string to the entity -- change "%3A" after the namespace in the PID to ":". E.g., from this http://beta.cwrc.ca/islandora/object/cwrc%3Ab774f9b9-9b77-4601-b4b7-1b19947f7800 derive this http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:b774f9b9-9b77-4601-b4b7-1b19947f7800
• VIAF entity URI formulation: http://viaf.org/viaf/PID
For example, http://viaf.org/viaf/56774589
properties.title: URI

properties.description: Person's alternative name. To add additional alternative names for this person, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Alternative Name

properties.description: Person's last name or family name.
properties.title: Family Name

properties.description: Person's first name or given names. To enter a different set of given names for this person, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Given Name

properties.description: Enter a role term (e.g., "Composer", "Conductor", "Instrumentalist", "Lyricist", "Musical director", "Musician", "Producer", "Recording engineer", "Recordist", "Singer", "Sound designer", "Speaker", etc.). Choose the MARC relator term (i.e., role term) from http://www.loc.gov/marc/relators/relaterm.html. To enter more than one MARC relator term for this person, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Enter the name of an organization, institution, etc., with which the person was associated at the time that the resource was created. To enter more than one affiliation for this person, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Affiliation

properties.description: Person's dates. Providing the person's birth date (and death date, if applicable) can help to distinguish the person's name from other similar or identical names. For example, "1944-" (the person is still alive), "1882-1941" (the person is deceased).
properties.title: Dates

properties.description: Corporate name. To add additional corporate names for this resource, click on the green [+] button. Remember to change the "Type" value above from "personal" to "corporate".
properties.title: Corporate Name
Type of Resource / Type de ressource

properties.description: Choose the MODS type of resource value (this will usually be "sound recording", "sound recording-musical", or "sound recording-nonmusical") from the drop-down menu of enumerated values from the Library of Congress's MODS schema.
properties.title: Type of Resource

properties.description: Choose the format term from http://cwrc.ca/terms/format.pdf.
properties.title: Format

properties.description: Choose the primary genre (broad genre) term from http://cwrc.ca/terms/primary_genre.pdf. To enter more than one primary genre term, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Broad Genre

properties.description: Choose the subgenre (specific genre ) term from http://cwrc.ca/terms/subgenre.pdf. To enter more than one subgenre term, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Specific Genre

properties.description: You can enter a term from other genre authority lists in this field, including a "folksonomic" genre-related term, that describes the resource. To enter more than one additional genre term, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Additional Genre (member-contributed term)

properties.description: To enter more than one place of publication or issuance, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each place panel.
properties.title: Place of Publication or Issuance

properties.description: Enter the place where this item was published or issued (use "city", "city, region", "city, country", or "city, region, country" format).
properties.title: Place

properties.description:
A URI to a place entity that uniquely represents this place; e.g., the URI to the CWRC place entity for this place, or the URI to the place's GeoNames record in the GeoNames database.
• CWRC entity URI formulation: http://commons.cwrc.ca/PID
For example, http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:dd5f13a8-7e2e-43bb-97a6-193fa8b23051
The PID can be found after "/islandora/object/" in the URL string to the entity -- change "%3A" after the namespace in the PID to ":". E.g., from this http://beta.cwrc.ca/islandora/object/cwrc%3Add5f13a8-7e2e-43bb-97a6-193fa8b23051 derive this http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:dd5f13a8-7e2e-43bb-97a6-193fa8b23051
• GeoNames entity URI formulation: http://www.geonames.org/PID
For example, http://www.geonames.org/5946768
properties.title: URI

properties.description: Enter the name of the entity that published or issued the resource. To enter more than one issuing entity, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Publisher or Issuer

properties.description: Enter the date this resource was published or issued (use "YYYY", "YYYY-MM", or "YYYY-MM-DD" format).
properties.title: Date Published or Issued

properties.description: Enter information identifying the version of the resource.
properties.title: Edition

properties.description: Choose the ISO 639-2 "English name of language" term from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/English_list.php. To enter more than one ISO 639-2 "English name of language" term, click on the green [+] button. Note: most resources will be in either "English" or "French".
properties.title: Language

properties.description: If the resource is in electronic form, identify the electronic format type of the resource.
properties.title: Internet Media Type

properties.description: Enter a statement related to measurable physical characteristics. For example: 25 p.; ill.; music; 26 cm; 7" x 9". Application: may be used to describe print or electronic resources.
properties.title: Pages, Measurements

properties.description: General information about the physical description of the resource.
properties.title: Physical Description Note

properties.description: A summary of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Abstract
Table of Contents / Table des matières

properties.description: A description of the contents of a resource.
properties.title: Table of Contents

properties.description: Public note about the audio album.
properties.title: Scholar Note

properties.description: Internal note about the audio album.
properties.title: Research Note

properties.description: General note about the audio album (and that is not flagged using the @type attribute as either a scholar note or a research note).
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Add terms or phrases representing the primary topic(s) on which this resource is focused.
properties.title: Subject Terms / Sujets

properties.description: To enter more than one topical subject term, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each topical subject term.
properties.title: Topic

properties.description: Use this field to apply a topical subject term to describe the resource.
properties.title: Topical Subject Term

properties.description:
If the topical subject term is for a named entity, you can provide a URI to a named entity (e.g., title, person, organization, or place entity) that uniquely represents this topical subject term named entity reference.
• CWRC entity URI formulation: http://commons.cwrc.ca/PID
For example, http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:eb67c450-cd60-4f81-a7fb-70d29d7b1a4d
The PID can be found after "/islandora/object/" in the URL string to the entity -- change "%3A" after the namespace in the PID to ":". E.g., from this http://beta.cwrc.ca/islandora/object/cwrc%3Aeb67c450-cd60-4f81-a7fb-70d29d7b1a4d derive this http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:eb67c450-cd60-4f81-a7fb-70d29d7b1a4d
• VIAF entity URI formulation: http://viaf.org/viaf/PID
For example, http://viaf.org/viaf/131378718
• GeoNames entity URI formulation: http://www.geonames.org/PID
For example, http://www.geonames.org/6094817
properties.title: URI

properties.description: To enter more than one geographic subject term, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each geographic subject term.
properties.title: Geographic

properties.description: Use this field to apply a geographic subject term to describe the resource.
properties.title: Geographic Subject Term

properties.description:
A URI to a place entity that uniquely represents this geographic subject term; e.g., the URI to the CWRC place entity for this geographic subject term, or the URI to the place's GeoNames record in the GeoNames database.
• CWRC entity URI formulation: http://commons.cwrc.ca/PID
For example, http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:dd5f13a8-7e2e-43bb-97a6-193fa8b23051
The PID can be found after "/islandora/object/" in the URL string to the entity -- change "%3A" after the namespace in the PID to ":". E.g., from this http://beta.cwrc.ca/islandora/object/cwrc%3Add5f13a8-7e2e-43bb-97a6-193fa8b23051 derive this http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:dd5f13a8-7e2e-43bb-97a6-193fa8b23051
• GeoNames entity URI formulation: http://www.geonames.org/PID
For example, http://www.geonames.org/5946768
properties.title: URI

properties.description: To enter more than one temporal subject term, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each temporal subject term.
properties.title: Temporal

properties.description: Use this field to apply a temporal subject term to describe the resource. To provide the temporal date for the resource, use YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format (most appropriate and adequate values will be in YYYY format).
properties.title: Temporal Subject Term

properties.description: To enter more than one temporal range subject term, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each temporal range subject term.
properties.title: Temporal Range

properties.description: Select "start" for the start date for the temporal date range for the resource, and provide the start date below, and then click on the "Add" button, and then repeat these operations in the second tab using "end" for the end date for the temporal date range for the resource.
properties.title: Point

properties.description: Use this field to apply a temporal range subject term to describe the resource. To provide the temporal start or end date for the resource, use YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format (most appropriate and adequate values will be in YYYY format).
properties.title: Temporal Range Subject Term

properties.description: To enter more than one title subject term, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each title subject term.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Use this field to apply a title subject term to describe the resource.
properties.title: Title Subject Term

properties.description:
A URI to a title entity that uniquely represents this title subject term; e.g., the URI to the CWRC title entity for this title subject term, or the URI to the title's "Works" or "Expressions" record in VIAF (Virtual International Authority File).
• CWRC entity URI formulation: http://commons.cwrc.ca/PID
For example, http://commons.cwrc.ca/islandora:6167a5c9-80a3-4c85-8acb-f5ee93b65e21
The PID can be found after "/islandora/object/" in the URL string to the entity -- change "%3A" after the namespace in the PID to ":". E.g., from this http://beta.cwrc.ca/islandora/object/islandora%3A6167a5c9-80a3-4c85-8acb-f5ee93b65e21 derive this http://commons.cwrc.ca/islandora:6167a5c9-80a3-4c85-8acb-f5ee93b65e21
• VIAF entity URI formulation: http://viaf.org/viaf/PID
For example, http://viaf.org/viaf/48146462553927771156
properties.title: URI

properties.description: To enter more than one name subject term, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each name subject term.
properties.title: Name

properties.description: Please ensure that the correct type of name subject entity reference is selected: "personal" (for persons), or "corporate" (for organizations).
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Use this field to apply a name subject term to describe the resource.
properties.title: Name Subject Term

properties.description:
A URI to a person or organization entity that uniquely represents this name subject term; e.g., the URI to the CWRC person or organization entity for this name subject term, or the URI to the person's "Personal Names" record or the organization's "Corporate Names" record in VIAF (Virtual International Authority File).
• CWRC entity URI formulation: http://commons.cwrc.ca/PID
For example, http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:b774f9b9-9b77-4601-b4b7-1b19947f7800
The PID can be found after "/islandora/object/" in the URL string to the entity -- change "%3A" after the namespace in the PID to ":". E.g., from this http://beta.cwrc.ca/islandora/object/cwrc%3Ab774f9b9-9b77-4601-b4b7-1b19947f7800 derive this http://commons.cwrc.ca/cwrc:b774f9b9-9b77-4601-b4b7-1b19947f7800
• VIAF entity URI formulation: http://viaf.org/viaf/PID
For example, http://viaf.org/viaf/56774589
properties.title: URI

properties.description: A designation applied to the resource that indicates the subject by applying a formal system of coding and organizing resources according to subject areas. For example, Library of Congress Classification (LCC) number, Dewey Decimal Classification (DCC) number, etc.
properties.title: Classification

properties.description:
Enter a URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) that identifies the resource, i.e., enter a URI to a linked data resource that is the same as this entity (e.g., a VIAF record).
• VIAF entity URI formulation: http://viaf.org/viaf/PID
For example, http://viaf.org/viaf/48146462553927771156
properties.title: URI

properties.description: Enter a sound recording record label name and issue number (i.e., catalog number) that identifies the resource.
properties.title: Issue Number

properties.description: Enter a sound recording matrix number that identifies the resource.
properties.title: Matrix Number

properties.description: Enter an EAN (International Article Number) that identifies the resource.
properties.title: EAN

properties.description: Enter a UPC (Universal Product Code) that identifies the resource.
properties.title: UPC

properties.description: Enter a LCCN (Library of Congress Control Number) that identifies the resource.
properties.title: LCCN

properties.description: Specific information used to locate a resource within a collection, such as the name of an institution/repository, and perhaps, subcollection. A shelf number can be entered in the Shelf or Archive Location field.
properties.title: Physical Location

properties.description: Shelfmark or other shelving designation that indicates the location identifier for a copy (e.g., Library of Congress Classification call number).
properties.title: Shelf or Archive Location

properties.description: URL (Uniform Resource Location) of the resource.
properties.title: URL

properties.description: Select the access condition statement (the digital use and reproduction statement) that should be applied to this digital object. Information about the Creative Commons CC BY-NC and CC BY-NC-SA licenses can be found at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/. (The Orlando access condition statement only applies to resources associated with the Orlando Project.)

index.key: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.
Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
Access to this resource is restricted by a license between the University of Alberta and Cambridge University Press.

properties.title: Access Condition Statement

properties.description: If desired, provide another access condition statement (the digital use and reproduction statement) that should be applied to this digital object. To enter more than one other access condition statement, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Other Access Condition Statement

create.value: <recordInfo> <recordOrigin>This MODS record was created using the Islandora XML Forms collection of Drupal modules.</recordOrigin> <languageOfCataloging> <languageTerm type="text">English</languageTerm> </languageOfCataloging> <recordContentSource>Canadian Writing Research Collaboratory</recordContentSource> </recordInfo>

properties.title: Record Content Source / Contenu Source d'enregistrement

properties.description: To enter more than one project, click on the Add button. Use tabs above to edit each project. Note: you can also supply your project's name in the field below.
properties.title: Associated Project

properties.description: If applicable and desired, select a project to associate with the creation of this MODS record (any project may use the value "cwrc").
properties.title: Project

properties.description: If desired, enter a project to associate with the creation of this MODS record. To enter more than one project, click on the green [+] button.
properties.title: Other Associated Project
